p.k: 85% Oscar-winning wartime romance starring Humphrey Bogart as an ex-pat bar owner torn between love and virtue. Ingrid Bergman co-stars as his former flame
66% Coming-of-age drama starring Talitha Bateman (Love, Simon) as a spirited youngster who embarks on a cross-country trip to unravel the truth about her family history
Against the wishes of her mum, aspiring street dancer Skyler enters Atlanta's underground dance scene in order to hone her moves for a life-changing scholarship. Drama
58% Modern take on The Crucible starring Chris Messina as a substitute drama teacher whose taboo relationship with an unstable student strikes a nerve
77% Will Smith is the good Samaritan driven to acts of incredible kindness by a dark secret in this powerful, life-affirming drama. With Woody Harrelson
72% An Oscar-winning Jeff Bridges stars as an alcoholic country singer getting one last shot at the big time. Maggie Gyllenhaal and Colin Farrell co-star
79% Will Smith inspires as the down on his luck dad chasing the American Dream in 80s San Francisco. Heart-warming drama co-starring Jaden Smith
An ageing and isolated Queen Victoria (Judi Dench) begins an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk. Period drama from Stephen Frears
77% Jesse Eisenberg plays Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg in David Fincher's Oscar-winning drama. With Andrew Garfield and Justin Timberlake
